doc.field: 3 non-commercial videocassettes (Social Club Task Force Inspection tape, 2 of FDNY videos: fire prevention series). Book "Under Fire: The West is Burning" re: western wildfires and other docs on wildfires, including binder of Incident Command System print matter from National Wildfire Coordinating Group (1980s). FDNY binder: "Combating Terrorism Leadership Program", 2004. Various presentations/print matter on incident management, emergency management, including chemical/LNG. Operational security plan (2005). EDC's "Industrial Strategy" of 2003. Presentation with CD-rom "FDNY Emerging Technology and the FDNY" re: communications. Digital files/PDFs from Cengage Learning of Spadafora's Green Book, 2013. (Includes digital formats, video)
